translation.firstStep: The first step to receiving your free tokens.
translation.getSmallAmount: Get a small amount of SUPRA to try the network—no purchases required.
translation.supraDescription: Supra is a next-generation Layer‑1 blockchain focused on speed, tiny fees, and developer-friendly automation. The SUPRA token powers transactions, governance, and smart features such as real‑time oracles and programmable automation that make apps faster and simpler for users. Think of it as a blockchain built so teams can ship useful apps without fighting slow confirmations or high costs.
translation.ultraFast: Ultra-fast & low-cost: Designed for instant-like finality and minimal fees.
translation.realTimeData: Real-time data: Built-in oracles bring live information to smart contracts.
translation.automationReady: Automation-ready: Native tools for scheduled tasks and reliable on‑chain workflows.
translation.developerFriendly: Developer friendly: SDKs, bridges and integrations so projects launch faster.
translation.faucetPurpose: This faucet gives a small amount of SUPRA so anybody can explore the network without spending money. It’s perfect for beginners trying a wallet or dApp, developers testing features, and curious users who want to learn by doing.
translation.connectWalletStep: Connect a compatible wallet (for example: Starkey).
translation.verifyStep: Verify — it perform a quick, automated check to prevent abuse.
translation.claimStep: Claim — press the button and receive tokens on-chain within seconds.
translation.tip: Tip: One claim per address. If you see an issue, check your wallet network settings or contact support.
translation.readyToTry: Ready to try Supra? Connect your wallet and claim — then explore dApps, add liquidity, or build your own project. If you want a shorter version for a banner or mobile view, I can prepare that too.

SuccessModal.title: Transaction Successful!

translation.joinSupraCommunity: Join the unofficial Supra community on <link>Telegram</link> and stay up to date.
